brief_title: An Extension Study of An Investigational Drug in Patients With Hypercholesterolemia (0653A-038)(COMPLETED)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the lipid lowering effects of an investigational drug in patients with hypercholesterolemia (high cholesterol).
intervention_name: MK0653A, ezetimibe (+) simvastatin / Duration of Treatment: 14 weeks
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - High cholesterol Exclusion Criteria: - Patient has a condition which, in the opinion of the investigator, might pose a risk to the patient, interfere with participation in the study, or does not meet the additional criteria as required by the study.
